techmeme.title: The Senate approves Gail Slater, President Trump's pick to lead the DOJ's antitrust unit, by a 78-19 vote; she has been critical of power in the tech industry (David McCabe/New York Times)
Sam Altman says OpenAI trained an AI model that is good at creative writing and shares a short story it wrote; he's "not sure yet how/when it will get released" (Sam Altman/@sama)
Mesh raised an $82M Series B, settled mostly in PayPal's PYUSD stablecoin and led by Paradigm, to expand its stablecoin-based payments settlement network (Krisztian Sandor/CoinDesk)
Court filings: Google owns a 14% stake in Anthropic but holds no voting rights, board seats, or board observer rights; it aims to invest $750M more in September (New York Times)
Manus partners with Alibaba's Qwen to integrate Manus' AI agent functions with AI models and computing platforms in China and to collaborate on Qwen's AI models (Reuters)
